attributes.action: Ensure that local councils adequately support primary and secondary peripatetic music services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Funding is constantly being cut for peripatetic music lessons in schools across the country. In Ceredigion, west Wales, the county council plan on completely slashing the service's funding - the only council in Wales to do so. It is important that these services are protected and maintained.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Welsh Assembly
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
